eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @4ian
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: Health
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Manage health (life) points, shield and armor.
description: Manage health (life) points, shield and armor.
- Inanimate objects (for insance breakable doors or mining rocks)
The top-down RPG example uses this extension ([open the project online](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?project=example://top-down-rpg)).

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Manage health (life) points, shield and armor.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Health

events.comment: Health
Correct any values above maximum limits
Shield
Correct any values above maximum limits

events.name: Remove shield points if shield expired

eventsFunctions.description: Apply damage to the object. Shield and armor can reduce this damage if enabled.
eventsFunctions.name: Hit
eventsFunctions.sentence: Apply _PARAM2_ points of damage to _PARAM0_ (Damage can be reduced by Shield: _PARAM3_, Armor: _PARAM4_)

events.comment: Only consider incoming damage when damage cooldown is not active
No damage will be applied when dodged
If shield is active, damage the shield first
If damage is less than shield, subtract damage from shield.
If damage is greater than shield, conditionally apply excess damage based on property
Apply excess damage only if shield does not block excess damage

eventsFunctions.description: current health points of the object.

eventsFunctions.description: Heal the object by increasing its health points.

events.comment: If Max Health is not set, do not enforce Max Health
If Max Health is set and Overhealing is not allowed
Perform heal
Update healing trigger

parameters.description: Points to heal (will be added to object health)

eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: PanelSpriteContinuousBar
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: A bar that represents a resource in the game (health, mana, ammo, etc).
description: A bar that represents a resource in the game (health, mana, ammo, etc).
There are ready-to-use resource bars in the asset-store [resource bars pack](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?initial-dialog=asset-store&asset-pack=resource-bars-resource-bars).

eventsBasedObjects.description: A bar that represents a resource in the game (health, mana, ammo, etc).
eventsBasedObjects.name: PanelSpriteContinuousBar

events.comment: This allows to detect a change of "intial value" on hot reload.
Create the child-object instances.
Create the label over the bar.
Pass the configuration to the behavior.

Children instances must be resized when the parent size change:
- background is resized to take the full dimensions of the parent
- the bar size is refreshed according to the value
- the label is put back at the center of the bar

The scale is set back to 1 because it means that the parent instance has the same dimensions as the union of its children instances.

eventsFunctions.description: Center the bar according to the button configuration. This is used in doStepPostEvents when the button is resized.
eventsFunctions.name: UpdateLayout

eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: ObjectSpawner
description: Spawn objects periodically based on the location of the spawner.
If "random position" is enabled, objects will spawn in a random position inside the spawner object.
This allows the size of the spawner object to define an area that objects will spawn.
It can be used to create:
Note: Offset properties were deprecated in version 1.0.0.

eventsFunctions.description: Spawn (create) objects periodically. This action must be run every frame to work. When the max quantity is reached and an instance is deleted, the spawner waits the duration of the spawn period before creating another instance. Spawned objects are automatically linked to the spawner.
eventsFunctions.name: SpawnObject
eventsFunctions.sentence: Periodically spawn (create) a _PARAM2_ located at spawner _PARAM0_

events.comment: Check if max number of instances per spawner has been reached. Always spawn objects if quantity is set to "0"
Prevent objects from being spawned immediately after deleting an object while at max quantity alive
Check if max number of instances per spawner has been reached
Reset spawn detection
Spawn an object when conditions are met. Spawned objects are linked to the spawner that made them
Spawn at Center Position
Legacy action that supports deprecated offsets
Move to a Random Position (if enabled)

eventsFunctions.description: Change the offset X relative to the center of spawner (in pixels).

eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the offset X of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ pixels

eventsFunctions.name: SetOffsetY
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change the offset Y of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ pixels

eventsFunctions.name: SetSpawnPeriod

eventsFunctions.description: Return the offset Y relative to the center of spawner (in pixels).

eventsFunctions.description: Return the spawn period (in seconds).
eventsFunctions.name: SpawnPeriod

eventsFunctions.name: MaxQuantity

propertyDescriptors.label: Max objects in the scene (per spawner)

propertyDescriptors.label: Spawner capacity
